abstract: Martin Škrtel (Slovak pronunciation: [ˈmartɪn ˈʃkr̩cɛl]; born 15 December 1984) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a centre back for Liverpool and captains the Slovakia national team. He previously played for Trenčín and Zenit Saint Petersburg. He has won the Russian Premier League and the Football League Cup, has been named Slovak Footballer of the Year four times and represented the country at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
